text:
Boston Consulting Group - Digital Ventures , Manhattan Beach,CA - iOS / Full-Time

https://www.bcgdv.com

Digital Ventures is BCG's new business focused on creating new innovative businesses for our clients. We have a great work environment. Ranked #2 company to work for in the US.

We are looking for iOS developers with minimum 3 years of experience. You must have solid CS background and developed several iOS apps.

Please send your resume to kalpesh.solanki@bcgdv.com
